title: Wait, what? After game text

replies.body: /me command. It functions like emote chat format in games like WoW and ESO.
I've been hearing this "/me" thing going around. Maybe it's that? I have no idea.
As others have said, it's just a /me command. It has no impact on the client or game itself other than simply changing the style of the text.
its actually a bug, though the bolding is from this patch, maybe they want it as a feature instead of just a bug now, who knows.

I'm not entirely sure, but I believe it may have been a feature that was shipped before it was meant to that they just kinda left there cause it wasn't hurting anyone. They changed the font (colour + bold) because it looked too much like the actual system messages that says stuff like x has left the room and so on.
Didnt deserve an S with that score.
